## Purpose
This catalog will archive contributions made by contributors and act as a central location for organizng all of the data available for synthetic IEA/EBM products. 

These products include SOE, Eventual ESR, ECSA?, other?. 

This product will outline what contributors did and why it is important for EBM. 

## Maintainence
It will be built with bookdown and travis/git actions.
